title: Timber Kings Lakeshore Estate
address: 1897 Blind Bay Road, Sorrento, BC V0E 2W0
features: Est. Range: $2,550,000 - $2,850,000. 320ft Shuswap Lake frontage, custom Pioneer Log Homes (Timber Kings) build, radiant in-floor heating, soaring stone fireplace, detached triple garage + additional shop plans, western sunset exposure.

title: Oyama Ridge Acreage
address: 6011 Oyama Lake Road, Lake Country, BC V4V 2C9
features: Est. Range: $1,150,000 - $1,250,000. Panoramic Kalamalka Lake views, 10-car detached garage/workshop, 2001-built home. Scarcity driven by 10+ acre size and potential for subdivision/secondary dwelling per Bylaw 1298 (2025). Significant wildfire risk due to single-access dirt road and surrounding forest.

title: Cathedral Chalet & Solar Workshop
features: Est. Range: $2,450,000 - $2,725,000. Gated acreage with 25ft cathedral ceilings, brand new chef's kitchen, and timber-frame aesthetics. Key value driver is the separate solar-powered commercial workshop (3-bay) with boardroom/office. Includes legal 2-bed suite and RV pad with full hookups.
